title: Tomato Pachadi / Chutney
content:
Side Dish: Tomato pachadi Yields: 300 grams Duration: 20 mins Tomato pachadi is a delicious side dish that accompanied with idli/dosa and rice. This lip-smacking chutney tastes like sweet, sour and yummy :-) It super simple to make and I am sure you'll definitely love it. Do try this new recipe and serve with your favorite idli/dosa/rice. Check out Idli/dosa recipes you might like:
  • Kanchipuram Idli
  • Idly | Steamed Idly with Idly Rava | Soft Idly | Southeast Asian Cake 👌
  • Mokkajonna 🌽 Rava Idly | Broken Corn Idly 😍 | Instant Corn rava Idly
  • Plain Dosa
  • Adai Dosa/ Lentils Dosa 😋 || Breakfast
Let's start with ingredients and follows the procedure Ingredients:
  • Red Tomatoes - 500 grams
  • Garlic - 3 cloves - chopped ( peeled off )
  • Mustard seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin seeds -- 1 tsp
  • Urad dal - 1/2 tbsp
  • Chana dal - 1/2 tbsp
  • Curry leaves - 8
  • Coconut oil - 2 tbsp ( Instead, You can use any cooking oil )
  • Salt - 3/4 tsp
  • Red chili powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Turmeric powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Jaggery - 1-inch piece or 1 tbsp powder
  • Tamarind water - 1/2 tbsp
Procedure:
  • On a medium heated pan, add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal, and chana dal and saute a minute
  • Then add chopped garlic cloves and saute, next add curry leaves
  • Saute and then add chopped tomatoes
  • Saute and cook for 10 mins or till tomatoes become mushy and soft
  • Next add salt, red chilly powder, turmeric powder, jaggery, and tamarind water
  • Mix well and cook more 10 mins or till the consistency reduces in quantity
  • Now, pachadi cooked well. Turn off heat and serve with idli / dosa  or with rice
  • Happy cooking and Have a great day
